description:
We learn Kyoya’s motivations for sponsoring the Gaen Cup Tournament. Kiri wakes up in hospital and immediately sets out to realize a mysterious plan of his own. And some familiar faces return to Aibo, but something is noticeably different about them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaette Kita Tora! Sono Tatakai wa Destiny!!
帰ってきた虎! その闘いはデスティニー!!
